Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the City Council to condemn the City Board of Elections for its lenient reprimand of a Board employee who used blatant racial/gender slurs to describe another Board employee, and calling upon the appropriate committee of the Council to conduct an oversight hearing to address such event and examine sensitivity training at the Board regarding race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, disability and age discrimination.
Items.MatterName: Condemn the City Board of Elections for its lenient reprimand of a Board employee who used blatant racial/gender slurs to describe another Board employee.

Items.Title: Oversight - BOARD OF ELECTIONS PERSONNEL POLICIES:  Zero Tolerance for Discrimination based on one's Race, Ethnicity, Gender, Sexual Orientation, Disability or Age.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Board of Elections Personnel Policies:  Zero Tolerance for Discrimination based on one's Race, Ethnicity, Gender, Sexual Orientation, Disability or Age.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the City Council to condemn the City Board of Elections for its lenient reprimand of a Board employee who used blatant racial/gender slurs to describe another Board employee, and calling upon the appropriate committee of the Council to conduct an oversight hearing to address such event and examine sensitivity training at the Board regarding race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, disability and age discrimination.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Lopez and Jackson
